sentences.en: A good face is a letter of recommendation.
sentences.cn: 漂亮的面孔就是最好的介绍信.

sentences.en: Academic staff are appointed on the recommendation of a committee.
sentences.cn: 教员是委员会推荐任命的。

sentences.en: Acting on your recommendation, I have decided to read the article once more.
sentences.cn: 按照你的劝告, 我决定把这篇文章再读一遍.

sentences.en: He read Lu xun's on her recommendation.
sentences.cn: 根据她的推荐他阅读了鲁讯的作品.

sentences.en: His chief recommendation is his honesty.
sentences.cn: 他的主要长处是诚实.

sentences.en: I wrote him a good recommendation.
sentences.cn: 我为他写了一封很好的推荐信.

sentences.en: I'll overrule Tynan's recommendation and see she's admitted.
sentences.cn: 我将驳回泰纳恩的建议,保证埃米入境.

sentences.en: It's best to find a builder through personal recommendation.
sentences.cn: 最好通过私人介绍寻找施工人员。

sentences.en: Major inter - agency disagreements are to be referred to CEQ for its recommendation.
sentences.cn: 机构之间的主要异议可以提交环境质量委员会做出建议.

sentences.en: Nearly 60% of our bookings come from repeat business and personal recommendation.
sentences.cn: 我们近60%的订单来自于回头客和熟人介绍。

sentences.en: On O'Leary's recommendation, they started with tortellini.
sentences.cn: 在奥利里的推荐下，他们首先点了意大利饺子。

sentences.en: Please find enclosed my CV and a letter of recommendation from my school principal.
sentences.cn: 请查收我附件里的CV,和我学校推荐人的介绍信.

sentences.en: Swiss chocolates need no recommendation.
sentences.cn: 瑞士巧克力无需推销.

sentences.en: The decision was made on the recommendation of the Interior Minister.
sentences.cn: 决议是根据内政部部长的提议作出的。

sentences.en: The House of Representatives approved the Commission's recommendation on January 9,1902.
sentences.cn: 众议院于1902年1月9日批准该委员会的建议书.

sentences.en: The WHO recommendation has no legal status.
sentences.cn: 世界卫生组织的建议不具备法律效应。

sentences.en: This method deserves recommendation.
sentences.cn: 这种做法值得提倡.

sentences.en: Try to get letters of recommendation from bosses and colleagues.
sentences.cn: 设法得到老板和同事的推荐信。

sentences.en: We chose the hotel on their recommendation (= because they recommended it).
sentences.cn: 我们根据他们的推荐选了这家酒店。

sentences.en: We will review the case and make a recommendation to the client.
sentences.cn: 我们将审查此案，然后向当事人提出建议。

words.tran_cn: 推荐，介绍；劝告；使受欢迎；托付

trans.tran_cn: 推荐，推荐信，建议，可取之处
trans.tran_en: official advice given to someone, especially about what to do
